articles.description: There was a minute's silence in remembrance for the former Magpies winger ahead of their 2-0 defeat to Liverpool, after his body was found under rubble following the earthquakes in Turkey.
articles.content:
Eddie Howe, Allan Saint-Maximin and Rafa Benitez have all paid tribute to Christian Atsu who tragically passed away following the earthquakes in Turkey. 
There was a minute's silence in remembrance … [+2734 chars]
